title: Momofuku Intern to CEO: Growing a Food Empire
description:
Pull up a chair at the Noodle Bar with Nora and Scott as they chat with Momofuku CEO Marguerite Zabar Mariscal about running a restaurant empire with David Chang at age 31, just 10 years after joining Momofuku as an intern in 2011.
Full transcripts for all Business Casual episodes available at https://businesscasual.fm
itunes:title: Momofuku Intern to CEO: Growing a Food Empire
itunes:author: Morning Brew
itunes:subtitle: And keeps it “super intentional and super delicious”
